name: Pesto Prosciutto Ricotta Wraps
author: PocketBrain
summary: I was inspired to make something interesting with prosciutto.
directions: Lay 1 sandwich wrap on a work surface
Spread 1 ounce ricotta cheese over the wrap, covering about 2/3 of the surface and leaving 1 end without ricotta
Top ricotta cheese layer with prosciutto
Spread about 1 tablespoon pesto over prosciutto
Carefully roll the wrap around the filling, starting with the covered end
You may need to tug on the ends of the prosciutto to take up slack
The uncovered end of the bread is to account for this
Refrigerate wraps until chilled, about 1 hour
Slice wraps into 1/2-inch-thick pieces and lay on a bed of Parmesan cheese
